title: Bug 16808Icon in Windows taskbar incorrect
description: Bug 16808Icon in Windows taskbar incorrect 20020521 XP1. Note the window icon in the runtime workbench is correct but occasionallyits icon in the windows taskbar is incorrect (its just the default windowsicon)3.
OB: Changing perspectives in the runtime workbench changes the icon to becorrect (changing perspectives updates the window title but not the icon asfar as I know).I don't know why this happens sometimes and not others but it seems to happenat least 20% of the time I launch.
